name: Deserve It?
description:
Decide who will get a coal or a gift. Based on your decision you will progress through the game.

Tutorial

As we dont have a time to do a full tutorial in game I will write down it here.

  • Take closer look on the each person actions and decide what to give coal(left swipe) or gift(right swipe)
  • If you not rate people fair you will lose you scores.

Thats it.

Right swipe


Left swipe
